price: 11 C’est Nous qui, lorsque les eaux du Déluge ont tout submergé, vous avons transportés dans l’Arche,
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
